info.name: FOI
info.description: Collection used in FOI Postman's workshop.

item.name: 1. vjezba - GET request i dokumentacija

request.description:
### Get Objects

This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to retrieve a list of objects.

#### Request Body

This request does not require a request body.

#### Response

- Status: 200
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

The response body returns an array of objects, each containing an "id", "name", and "data" object with "color" and "capacity" properties.

Example response:

``` json
[
    {
        "id": "1",
        "name": "Google Pixel 6 Pro",
        "data": {
            "color": "Cloudy White",
            "capacity": "128 GB"
        }
    },
    ...
]

 ```

This endpoint requests an HTTP GET to retrieve information about a specific object identified by its object_id. The purpose of this request is to fetch details of the object.

### Request

- Method: GET
    
- URL: `https://api.restful-api.dev/objects/:object_id`
    

### Specific Headers

No specific headers are required for this request.

### Parameters

- `object_id` (in the URL path): The unique identifier of the object for which the details are being fetched.
    

#### Response

- Status: 200
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

The response body will contain the details of the object, including its ID, name, and data related to color and capacity in GB.

Example response:

``` json
{
    "id": "3",
    "name": "Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max",
    "data": {
        "color": "Cloudy White",
        "capacity GB": 512
    }
}

 ```

item.description: Documentation for FOI Postman workshop's 1st exercise
